description: Construction of 3 advertisement hoardings, (a) 9m by 3m (single), (b) 7.5m by 3m (Y board), (c) 6m by 3m (single) at (a) Gypsy Corner next to 252 Western Avenue, (b) on Western Avenue and (c) where Victoria Road and Chase Road meets
decision_conditions: This permission shall be for a limited period expiring on 22/10/2002 when the advertisement(s) shall be removed from the site.  REASON: In the interests of road safety. | The existing unauthorised pole mounted sign shall be removed before the advertisements hereby approved are displayed.  REASON: To prevent the unsightly proliferation of advertisements which would be harmful to the visual amenity; and in the interests of highway safety. | The sign hereby approved shall be static and non-illuminated.  REASON:   In the interests of visual amenity and highway safety.
